program.name: lcms
program.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-blibpath:" ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -Ae +ESlit +Onofltacc +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ;; *-irix6*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 -O2 \ -OPT:Olimit=0" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-linux*) CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -msym -readonly_strings" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-solaris2.[89]) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; *-solaris2*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=generic" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; esac
./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ CPPFLAGS="-I${SB_VAR_JPEG_INC} -I${SB_VAR_LIBTIFF_INC} \ -I${SB_VAR_ZLIB_INC}" LDFLAGS="-L${SB_VAR_JPEG_LIB} \ -L${SB_VAR_LIBTIFF_LIB} -L${SB_VAR_ZLIB_LIB} \ ${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_JPEG_LIB}:${SB_VAR_LIBTIFF_LIB}:\ ${SB_VAR_ZLIB_LIB} ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" \ --enable-shared --enable-static --disable-dependency-tracking \ --prefix=${INSTALL_PREFIX}
${SB_VAR_PERL}/bin/perl -pi -e "\ s!-L(\\\${libdir})!-L\$1 ${CC_LD_RT}\$1!" lcms.pc
# Don't use system swab() on Tru64 UNIX case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-osf*) ${SB_VAR_PERL}/bin/perl -pi -e "\ s!^// #define USE_CUSTOM_SWAB!#define USE_CUSTOM_SWAB!" include/lcms.h ;; esac
program.build:
# remove C++ comments gmake filter
(for _c in include/*.h src/*.c testbed/*.c; do mv ${_c} ${_c}.orig ./filter ${_c}.orig ${_c} done)
gmake
